string.text: Let's allow them to approach closer, so as no one escapes. I'll fire first, then you do.
Stalker, you have entered the territory controlled by Duty faction. Any sign of agression will be severely punished.

Attention everyone!! Duty's outpost at the Garbage speaking. The wave of mutants is moving from the Dark Valley to the Bar's direction. Everyone who assists in shooting off the vermins will be granted the gratitude from our side.
Stalker, you have entered the Duty's territory. Would you try to make any rows - you'll be granted the invalidity!
Attaboys, guys, we've defeated them. Everyone rest now, and you stalker come closer, let's have a chat.

Attention to all available stalkers! Damon is speaking. Bandits want to obtain control over this territory. Everyone who has objections and who is capable to bear arms, gathers at the machinery waste.
